verses.verse: The ark <WH727> of Yahweh <WH3068> was in the country <WH7704> of the Philistines <WH6430> seven <WH7651> months. <WH2320>

The Philistines <WH6430> called <WH7121> for the priests <WH3548> and the diviners, <WH7080> saying, <WH559> "What shall we do <WH6213> with the ark <WH727> of Yahweh? <WH3068> Show <WH3045> us with which we shall send <WH7971> it to its place. <WH4725>"

They said, <WH559> "If you send away <WH7971> the ark <WH727> of the God <WH430> of Israel, <WH3478> don't <WH7971> send it empty; <WH7387> but by all means <WH7725> return <WH7725> him a trespass offering: <WH817> then you shall be healed, <WH7495> and it shall be known <WH3045> to you why his hand <WH3027> is not removed from you. <WH5493>"

Then they said, <WH559> "What shall be the trespass offering <WH817> which we shall return <WH7725> to him? <WH559>" They said, "Five <WH2568> golden <WH2091> tumors, <WH2914> and five <WH2568> golden <WH2091> mice, <WH5909> for the number <WH4557> of the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines; <WH6430> for one <WH259> plague <WH4046> was on you all, <WH5633> and on your lords.

Therefore you shall make <WH6213> images <WH6754> of your tumors, <WH2914> and images <WH6754> of your mice <WH5909> that mar <WH7843> the land; <WH776> and you shall give <WH5414> glory <WH3519> to the God <WH430> of Israel: <WH3478> perhaps he will lighten <WH7043> his hand <WH3027> from off you, <WH430> and from off your gods, and from off your land. <WH776>

Why then do you harden <WH3513> your hearts, <WH3824> as the Egyptians <WH4714> and Pharaoh <WH6547> hardened <WH3513> their hearts? <WH3820> When he had worked wonderfully <WH5953> among them, <WH7971> didn't they let the people go, and they departed? <WH3212>

"Now therefore take <WH3947> and prepare <WH6213> yourselves a <WH259> new <WH2319> cart, <WH5699> and two <WH8147> milk <WH5763> cows, <WH6510> on which there has come <WH5927> no yoke; <WH5923> and tie <WH631> the cows <WH6510> to the cart, <WH5699> and bring <WH7725> their calves <WH1121> home <WH1004> from them; <WH310>

and take <WH3947> the ark <WH727> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and lay <WH5414> it on the cart; <WH5699> and put <WH7760> the jewels <WH3627> of gold, <WH2091> which you return <WH7725> him for a trespass offering, <WH817> in a coffer <WH712> by its side; <WH6654> and send it away, <WH7971> that it may go. <WH1980>

Behold; <WH7200> if it goes up <WH5927> by the way <WH1870> of its own border <WH1366> to Beth Shemesh, <WH1053> then he has done <WH6213> us this great <WH1419> evil: <WH7451> but if not, <WH3045> then we shall know that it is not his hand <WH3027> that struck <WH5060> us; <WH4745> it was a chance that happened to us. <WH1961>"
The men <WH582> did so, <WH6213> and took <WH3947> two <WH8147> milk <WH5763> cows, <WH6510> and tied <WH631> them to the cart, <WH5699> and shut up <WH3607> their calves <WH1121> at home; <WH1004>
and they put <WH7760> the ark <WH727> of Yahweh <WH3068> on the cart, <WH5699> and the coffer <WH712> with the mice <WH5909> of gold <WH2091> and the images <WH6754> of their tumors. <WH2914>

The cows <WH6510> took the straight <WH3474> way <WH1870> by the way <WH1870> to Beth Shemesh; <WH1053> they went along <WH1980> the highway, <WH4546> lowing <WH1600> as they went, <WH1980> and didn't <WH5493> turn aside to the right hand <WH3225> or to the left; <WH8040> and the lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> went <WH1980> after <WH310> them to the border <WH1366> of Beth Shemesh. <WH1053>

They of Beth Shemesh <WH1053> were reaping <WH7114> their wheat <WH2406> harvest <WH7105> in the valley; <WH6010> and they lifted up <WH5375> their eyes, <WH5869> and saw <WH7200> the ark, <WH727> and rejoiced <WH8055> to see it. <WH7200>

The cart <WH5699> came <WH935> into the field <WH7704> of Joshua <WH3091> of Beth Shemesh, <WH1030> and stood <WH5975> there, <WH1419> where there was a great stone: <WH68> and they split <WH1234> the wood <WH6086> of the cart, <WH5699> and offered <WH5927> up the cows <WH6510> for a burnt offering <WH5930> to Yahweh. <WH3068>

The Levites <WH3881> took down <WH3381> the ark <WH727> of Yahweh, <WH3068> and the coffer <WH712> that was with it, <WH3627> in which the jewels of gold <WH2091> were, <WH7760> and put them on the great <WH1419> stone: <WH68> and the men <WH582> of Beth Shemesh <WH1053> offered <WH5927> burnt offerings <WH5930> and sacrificed <WH2076> sacrifices <WH2077> the same day <WH3117> to Yahweh. <WH3068>
When the five <WH2568> lords <WH5633> of the Philistines <WH6430> had seen <WH7200> it, <WH7725> they returned to Ekron <WH6138> the same day. <WH3117>

These are the golden <WH2091> tumors <WH2914> which the Philistines <WH6430> returned <WH7725> for a trespass offering <WH817> to Yahweh: <WH3068> for Ashdod <WH795> one, <WH259> for Gaza <WH5804> one, <WH259> for Ashkelon <WH831> one, <WH259> for Gath <WH1661> one, <WH259> for Ekron <WH6138> one; <WH259>

and the golden <WH2091> mice, <WH5909> according to the number <WH4557> of all the cities <WH5892> of the Philistines <WH6430> belonging to the five <WH2568> lords, <WH5633> both of fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892> and of country <WH6521> villages, <WH3724> even to the great <WH1419> stone, <WH59> whereon they set down <WH3240> the ark <WH727> of Yahweh. <WH3068> That stone remains to this day <WH3117> in the field <WH7704> of Joshua <WH3091> of Beth Shemesh. <WH1030>

He struck <WH5221> of the men <WH376> of Beth Shemesh, <WH1053> because they had looked <WH7200> into the ark <WH727> of Yahweh, <WH3068> he struck <WH5221> of the people <WH5971> fifty <WH2572> thousand <WH505> seventy <WH7657> men; <WH582> and the people <WH5971> mourned, <WH56> because Yahweh <WH3068> had struck <WH5221> the people <WH582> with a great <WH1419> slaughter. <WH4347>

The men <WH582> of Beth Shemesh <WH1053> said, <WH559> "Who is able <WH3201> to stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> this holy <WH6918> God? <WH430> To whom shall he go up from us? <WH5927>"

They sent <WH7971> messengers <WH4397> to the inhabitants <WH3427> of Kiriath Jearim, <WH7157> saying, <WH559> "The Philistines <WH6430> have brought back <WH7725> the ark <WH727> of Yahweh; <WH3068> come down, <WH3381> and bring it up to yourselves. <WH5927>"
